sections.summary: a current sophomore majoring in sociology whom enjoys working and interacting with people. technologically savvy, a quick learner, and a strong work ethic ensures great leadership as well as a great team member. always willing to put best effort into work to accomplish goals with a friendly and positive attitude that contributes to a pleasant work environment.â
